Name: Base Station License, Approval, M & H Transportation Corp., Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by M & H Transportation Corp. for a license to operate a new base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by M & H Transportation Corp. for a license to operate a new base station at 388 14th Street in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 


LS#2613
